original_text: And behold, another beast, a second one, like a bear. It was raised up on one side. It had three ribs in its mouth between its teeth; and it was told, ‘Arise, devour much flesh.’
korean_text: 다른 짐승 곧 둘째는 곰과 같은데 그것이 몸 한쪽을 들었고 그 입의 잇사이에는 세 갈빗대가 물렸는데 그것에게 말하는 자들이 있어 이르기를 일어나서 많은 고기를 먹으라 하였더라

sentences.korean_translation: 다른 짐승, 두 번째 것이 있었으니,

sentences.original_text: It was raised up on one side.
It had three ribs in its mouth between its teeth;
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 입에는 이 사이에 세 갈비뼈가 있었고;
